io.oasp.gastronomy.restaurant.general.common

Class AbstractSpringBatchIntegrationTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.oasp.gastronomy.restaurant.general.common.AbstractSpringBatchIntegrationTest
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BillExportJobTest, ProductImportJobTest

    @DirtiesContext(classMode=AFTER_CLASS)
@ActiveProfiles(value="db-plain")
public abstract class AbstractSpringBatchIntegrationTest
extends Object
    Base class for all spring batch integration tests. It helps to do End-to-End job tests.
    Author:
    jczas
